name: Diggs
writer: Matt Groening (created by), Sylvain Chomet (written by: the couch gag), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Dan Greaney, Allen Glazier
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Bart becomes friends with a schoolmate who enjoys falconry, but turns out to be mentally disturbed.
